name: double_jump
multi_jump_impulse_multiplier: 1.3 //multiplies the deafult impulse by this value, makes the double jump seem more impactful

name: passive_ammo_on_kill
power: 0.25 //percentage of max ammo restored on kill

name: passive_immovable_object
power: 5 //amount of health lost for every shot once mag is empty

name: passive_movement_speed_when_not_hit
power: 50 // decrease speed amount when not boosted

name: Leap_Slam
leap_slam_minimum_angle: 0.2 //normalized value of the y-axis in the forward vector, 0 = straight forward, 1 = straight up

name: Cluster Bombs
overwrite: radius 300 //the search radius for the projectile

Name: Increased_Power_On_Direct_Hit
overwrite: direct_hit_multiplier 1.3 //Important: If you change this value, you need to manually change the weapons augment 10 damage to match the new value.

name: Ignite_on_Hit
overwrite: power 0.05 //how much of the base damage is applied per tick

name: Scanner_Grenade
max_duration: 1 //time for the pulse to reach max radius

name: Implosive_Pull
power: 2500 //how much force is applied (i.e how fast the character is pulled)
duration: 2 //how long the implosion is active once deployed
